verified_exact.title: Verified Authentic
verified_exact.subtitle: Document is exactly as sealed
verified_exact.description: This document is completely unchanged since attestation. Perfect cryptographic match confirms authenticity.
verified_exact.recommendation: Safe for legal and business use.

verified_visual.title: Visually Verified
verified_visual.subtitle: Content appears authentic but may be compressed
verified_visual.description: The document appears authentic but may have been compressed or reformatted since sealing. Visual content matches the original.
verified_visual.recommendation: Suitable for most purposes, but note potential format changes.

modified.title: Document Modified
modified.subtitle: Document has been changed since sealing
modified.description: This document has been significantly altered since it was sealed. The content no longer matches the original attestation.
modified.recommendation: Exercise caution - document integrity cannot be confirmed.

error_processing.title: Verification Error
error_processing.subtitle: Technical issue prevented verification
error_processing.description: A technical error occurred during verification. This does not indicate the document is invalid.
error_processing.recommendation: Try again or contact support if the problem persists.

error_invalid_format.title: Invalid Seal
error_invalid_format.subtitle: QR code contains invalid data
error_invalid_format.description: The QR code contains invalid or corrupted attestation data. This may indicate tampering or corruption.
error_invalid_format.recommendation: This seal cannot be trusted - verify the document source.

default.title: Unknown Status
default.subtitle: Unexpected verification result

sidebar.title: How Verification Works

step1.title: Get Attestation Data
step1.description: Either scan a QR code or upload a sealed document to get the attestation data that proves authenticity.

step2.title: QR Code Detection
step2.description: If automatic detection fails, click and drag on the image to manually select the QR code area.

step3.title: Hash Comparison
step3.description: We calculate the document's fingerprint (excluding the QR area) and compare it with the sealed version.

step4.title: Result
step4.description: Get confirmation whether the document matches the original sealed version.

sidebar.privacy: Privacy: Document verification happens entirely in your browser. Your files are never uploaded to our servers.
